sentence.text: The authors report here a brief summary of findings from 12 lines of genetically engineered epidermis development that presented with autosomal recessive congenital hydrocephalus.

Even though the direct relevance of mouse models to hydrocephalus in humans remains uncertain, the high prevalence of familial patterns of inheritance for congenital hydrocephalus in humans suggests that identification of genes responsible for development of hydrocephalus in epidermis development may lead to the identification of homologous modifier genes and susceptibility alleles in humans.
